name: Simple Wireframes
description:
What is simple wireframes?

A component kit to help designers and developers building webpages. The kit has the core structures found in almost all kinds of land pages or websites.


Features

  • Pre-made wireframes ready to use
  • Global color to use your own colors
  • Base typography styles created
  • Component 8 grid based
  • Layers following the visual design


🚀 Last Updates

---------------------------------------------------


27/10/2021


Improvements

  • Added button components to mobile
  • Added disabled buttons to both desktop and mobile
  • Added cards wireframes to mobile

Fixes

  • Some card text cards wireframe were not defined as components. Now there are all present in the assets panel
  • Some component auto layout alignment adjustments
